summary.span: 實作 方法的基礎 WPF 支援，這些方法可將「名稱-物件」對應儲存或擷取至特定 XAML 名稱範圍中。

span.span: Implements base WPF support for the methods that store or retrieve name-object mappings into a particular XAML namescope.

summary.span: 加入附加屬性支援，以簡化在項目層級動態取得或設定 XAML 名稱範圍的名稱。

span.span: Adds attached property support to make it simpler to get or set XAML namescope names dynamically at the element level..

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會實作內建的 XAML 名稱範圍支援，WPF XAML 的處理方式。This class implements built-in XAML namescope support for WPF treatment of XAML. 可協助建立初始剖析 XAML，例如當具現化設定樣式和範本為基礎的 XAML 名稱範圍。 assists in creation of initial XAML namescopes based on parsing XAML, such as when instantiating styles and templates. 它也支援建立 XAML 名稱範圍以外的項目一般 XAML 載入 WPF XAML 處理器實作就會發生的處理序。It also supports creation of XAML namescopes by processes that occur outside of normal XAML loading of elements by the WPF XAML processor implementation. 是通常更專用於提供比一般都涉及使用 XAML 名稱範圍的使用者程式碼案例的基礎結構。 is generally more devoted to supplying infrastructure than for common user code scenarios that involve working with a XAML namescope. 大部分的情況下，方法上公開和會更適當的方法呼叫來搜尋項目以 XAML 定義的名稱。For most scenarios, the methods exposed on and are more appropriate methods to call to search for elements by XAML-defined name. 所公開的屬性和會更適當的屬性，用來設定初始的名稱做為標記屬性。The properties exposed by and are more appropriate properties to use to set the initial name as markup attributes. 各種方法基底項目和維護 XAML 名稱範圍，以支援其他類別所使用和。The various methods of are used by base elements and other classes that maintain XAML namescopes in order to support and . 您通常會使用中的 API類別只有當您在替換或加強它們如何處理根項目 [XAML] 頁面上，以及範本的一部分的 XAML 名稱範圍的基底項目行為 (這會使用不同的 XAML 名稱範圍的其餘部分頁面）。You generally use the API in the class only if you are replacing or augmenting the base element behavior for how they process XAML namescopes for root elements of a XAML page, and as part of templates (which use a separate XAML namescope from the rest of the page). 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，提供集合的介面實作，使您可以存取的 XAML 名稱範圍，包括透過呼叫加入至它所持有的名稱的集合方法。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], provides collection interface implementations such that you can access the collections of names that are held by a XAML namescope, including adding to it through calls to an method. 如需有關 XAML 名稱範圍概念的詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md)。For more information on XAML namescope concepts, see [WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md). 在 XAML 名稱範圍中的名稱必須使用會限制您可以使用的輸入字串的特定文法API。Names in a XAML namescope must use a particular grammar that restricts the strings you might use for inputs of API. 請參閱[XamlName 文法](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md)。See [XamlName Grammar](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 數個基底項目 (， ) 也會公開`FindName`具有相同功能的方法。Several base elements (, ) also expose a `FindName` method with identical functionality. 基底項目版本執行傳統的邏輯樹狀結構，努力的根項目中 XAML 名稱範圍搜尋。The base element versions perform a XAML namescope search within the conventional logical tree, working towards the root element. XAML 名稱範圍決定之後，會將該 XAML 名稱範圍查詢要求的名稱。Once the XAML namescope is determined, that XAML namescope is queried for the requested name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此附加的屬性需要 XAML 或使用中的附加的屬性使用方式和在程式碼中的存取子。This attached property requires attached property usage in XAML, or use of the and accessors in code. 設定 XAML 名稱範圍並不常見。Setting the namescope in XAML is not common. 附加的屬性使用方式主要是為了方便附加的 XAML 名稱範圍，不會共用的 XAML 名稱範圍實作繼承的物件。The attached property usage is primarily to facilitate attaching XAML namescopes to objects that do not share inheritance for XAML namescope implementations. 和衍生的類別原本就支援此繼承。 and derived classes support this inheritance natively. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
